title: Automating Protein Interaction Analysis
summary: Research at Dr. Robert Murphy's Lab
description:
Immunocytochemistry can be used as an indicator of potential protein interactions. Once stained with different fluorescent antibodies, a computer vision algorithm is applied to analyze the microscopy images and determine if two different proteins colocalize, i.e. have overlapping signals.
 
I automated both immunocytochemistry and implemented the computer vision algorithm.
